item.title: Dancing through a Revue
item.author: Gareth Campbell,
item.description: When I attended a run-through of MTSoc’s new production, Dancing Through Life, none of them suspected that I was in fact a theatre critic in disguise. This was probably because I occasionally make a somewhat convincing keyboard player. So convincing I’m actually playing in the show next week. …

item.title: A tearful Obituary
item.author: Gareth Campbell,
item.description: Formed in 2003, Pure Reason Revolution have since released three albums, supported bands such as Mew, Placebo, and Porcupine Tree and have received critical acclaim. However they have only ever attracted a small cult following, so this gig marks the end of 8 years of what guitarist, Jamie Willcox, …
